alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 11:56PM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt, with ice jams also possible. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Steuben. * WHEN...Until 600 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1154 PM EST, local law enforcement reported minor flooding over roadways in the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Canisteo is already experiencing some minor flooding, in low lying areas. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. Ice jams are also possible, and could cause a localized, more rapid rise in water levels. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hornell, Canisteo, Addison, Woodhull, Jasper, Thurston, Troupsburg, Cameron, Greenwood, Hartsville, West Cameron, Gang Mills, North Hornell, Cameron Mills, North Cameron, Buena Vista, Risingville, Young Hickory, West Greenwood and Willeyville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
